intro: The wild maths race for clever minds
description:
Get ready for a fast and fun maths race for 1 to 4 players. Dash across the track as a hedgehog or frog and use smart tactics to slow down your opponents. Solve tricky maths challenges, collect sunbeams, and play action cards to be the first to cross the finish line. Perfect family fun that makes learning mental maths exciting

Brain-boosting fun for everyone. With five adjustable age levels from 6 to 10 plus, every child can enjoy the right challenge from addition to division. Animal Run is ideal for bringing school maths to life with play and laughter

- Play solo or with friends and family.
- Two thrilling tracks to explore: race across the grassy plain or splash through the lake.
- Five difficulty levels for ages 6 to 10 plus: age-appropriate challenges from addition to division.
- Tactical action cards: speed up your moves or block your opponents.
- Charming animal world: relaxing design with cute illustrations
